sen.j: 西川 利右衛門（にしかわ りえもん、生没年不詳）は、近江国出身の、江戸時代の商人。
sen.e: Riemon NISHIKAWA (dates of birth and death unknown) was from Omi Province, a merchant during the Edo period.
Riemon NISHIKAWA (date of birth and death unknown), born in Omi Province, was a merchant who lived during the Edo period.
sen.cmt: 表現を少し変えました。
sen.e: Riemon NISHIKAWA (date of birth and death unknown), born in Omi Province, was a merchant who lived during the Edo period.

sen.j: 屋号を大文字屋と称し、畳表や蚊帳などの商いで財を成した。
sen.e: He called yago (the name of the store) Daimonjiya and he made a fortune by trading in rushes for tatami matting and mosquito nets.
sen.cmt: 畳表→rushes for tatami mattingとしました。
sen.e: He ran a shop under the yago (name of the store) Daimonjiya, and made a fortune by trading tatami matting and mosquito nets.
sen.cmt: 表現を少し変えました。
sen.e: He ran a shop under the yago (name of the store) Daimonjiya, and made a fortune by trading tatami matting and mosquito nets.

sen.j: 「富を好しとし、其の徳を施せ」という家訓をたれていた。
sen.e: His family motto was 'Wealth is good, but contribution to society is even better.'
sen.cmt: 家訓→family mottoとしました。ウェブによりますと、「富を好しとし、其の徳を施せ」とは、「道理をわきまえて商いをすれば利益はついてくる。 利益をあげることは悪いことではないが、それに見合った社会貢献をすることが大切である」という意味になります。意訳しました。
sen.e: His family motto was 'value your wealth, and assume your due contribution to the society.'
sen.cmt: 家訓の表現を変えました。
sen.e: His family motto was, "Love your wealth, and give to society of its benefits."

sen.j: 彼の旧宅は現在、国の重要文化財に指定されている。
sen.e: His old residence is now designated as the national important cultural property.
The residence where he lived is now designated as a national important cultural property.
sen.cmt: 表現を少し変えました。
sen.e: The residence where he lived is now designated as a national important cultural property.
